metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10018 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an FPE in the functionPostScriptFunction::exec at Function.cc for the psOpIdiv case.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10018` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
libpoppler-cpp0 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
libpoppler58 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
poppler-utils - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
poppler package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14').
